name: Viral Network
overview:
Online Communications for Public Companies - Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin), Digital Advertising, Email Marketing, SEO, Websites & Videos “The Internet is a sea of billions of people… We sift through the noise to connect investors with the companies that interest them most”

Whether you’re an investor, broker, day trader, analyst, fund manager or investor relations, we all use new technologies and online communications. Our mission at Viral Network is to simplify and enhance the way public companies interact and engage with their current and potential shareholders.

A Full service team of 20 expert online communication specialists work closely with 6 powerful softwares to simplify the process of exemplifying a public company’s story online to a targeted and attentive audience.

In a sub-division called Viral Stocks (www.viralstocks.com), 35,000 online investors have come together in an unbiased community to collaborate
